member.name: T:Digipost.Api.Client.Domain.Enums.SensitivityLevel
member.summary: Defines if the message is sensitive or not.

member.name: F:Digipost.Api.Client.Domain.Enums.SensitivityLevel.Normal
member.summary: Default. Non sensitive message. Metadata about the message, like the sender and subject, will be revealed in user notifications (eg. email and SMS), and can also be seen when logged in at a security level below the one specified for the message.

member.name: F:Digipost.Api.Client.Domain.Enums.SensitivityLevel.Sensitive
member.summary: Sensitive message. Metadata about the message, like the sender and subject, will be hidden until logged in at the appropriate security level specified for the message.

member.param: List of hours after delivered where the sms notification will be delivered
